1.content: You got an headache while waking up. You know, that you slept very long, but you don´t remember the place,you are at now. Where are you?
1.title: Waking up

11.content: After you looked at your environment,you realized an forest. But the trees are bigger than you ever saw. A moment later, because you cut into your arm accidently with grass,you see, that the trees and so on are no big. You are just small,but how small?
11.title: In a forest

12.content: You quickly realized you are in a zoo cuz´ of the many cages of animals you see. You also saw, that you shrunk, because you saw a uncommon big leaf next to you. But how small are you now?
12.title: An zoo

121.content:
Another leaf lands in front of you and it's the size of a bus. That's when realization hits you. You had been shrunken down to exactly 1 inch tall. That meant that the animals in this zoo were as big as skyscrapers to you. You were less than a flea. As you stand on the ground, you hear all sorts of sounds such as a lion roaring, an elephant trumpeting, a tiger growling and a monkey shrieking and even the sound of an eagle's cry.

There was even the footsteps of a rather large creature and they were earthquakes at your current size. You were truly in a land of giants. Giants that might want to swallow you whole. You wonder about that and for some reason the idea of being swallowed by a giant animal sounds more intriguing to you than frightening. But before you could give the matter any more thought, a large shadow passes over you and the earthquakes get more powerful. Then you look up and give a look of shock as your jaw drops. You weren't merely in the zoo, you were in an animal's cage. There was a railing up above you at the height equal to two skyscrapers as big as the Petronas Towers stacked atop each other.

You look back and see you are in the...
121.title: Inch High in a Cage

122.content: Where in the zoo are you?
122.title: 3 Inches

13.content: After looking at what is next to you, you found yourself on a farm. Right from you are the horse stables, left the pigsties. But while looking at those giant buildings,you realized you are just...
13.title: What a big farm

14.content: Your quickly realized that the beach you are on, because of the many sand and you are not far from the water. But cuz you´re leaning against a palm, you realize that you are very small. But what is your new size?
14.title: A dream-like beach

15.content: You slightly look at your whole environment: Some very big trees, the sky clear with only one or two clouds and...an dragon flying up there? You realize, that you are in a different world, than the one you know. That alone would not be so hard,but you also are just...
15.title: A suprise at another world

info.brief_description: You wake up after a long time and find yourself shrunk.
info.description:
You got shrunk while you slept and after waking up you think about fulfilling your fantasy of becoming an animals meal or snack.

I wont delete as much,but please keep the vore at soft vore. Also please do not let the charakter shrink or grow further in the story.
